issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Refactor TableProvider.scan to return ExecutionPlan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9833](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9833). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Refactor TableProvider.scan to return ExecutionPlan instead of Vec<Partition> in preparation for removing Partition trait.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9833?focusedCommentId=17182700) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8028
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8028>
